tool_description: This API provides a list of organisations licensed to sponsor workers under Tiers 2 and 5 (UK for now).
name: Codeepy Vispox
title: Codeepy Vispox

api_list.name: Get Company Sponsor List

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The start index for the sponsor company in the list

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: The returned list format. The default supported is JSON

optional_parameters.name: s
optional_parameters.description: Generic search parameter. It searches in every field of name, city, county, tier, and subtier. If this 's' parameter is used, parameter  'n', 'ci', 'co', 't', 'st' will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: t
optional_parameters.description: Parameter for the company's visa tier (Tier 2 or Tier 5)

optional_parameters.name: co
optional_parameters.description: Parameter for the company's county name

optional_parameters.name: ci
optional_parameters.description: Parameter for the company's city name

optional_parameters.name: st
optional_parameters.description: Parameter for the company's visa sub-tier
